column2: <dt lang="en">May I speak to you for a while?</dt>
<dd lang="cmn-Latn_NEW">wô néng gën nî jiâng huã mä </dd>
<dd lang="cmn-Latn_OLD">wô néng gën nî jiâng huã mä </dd>
<dd lang="yue-Latn_OLD">Ngor hor yee tong lei gong gei goi ma?</dd>
<dd lang="nan-Latn_OLD">Wah eh sai ga ler gong wei bue?</dd>
<dd lang="cmn-Latn_NEW">jïn tiän hâo diân lè méi yôu</dd>
<dd lang="cmn-Latn_OLD">jïn tiän hâo diân lè méi yôu</dd>
<dd lang="yue-Latn_OLD">Gum yat gork tak deem yong? Hou di ma?</dd>
<dd lang="nan-Latn_OLD">Ler si si mih dai ji?</dd>
<dt lang="en">What makes you want to see a doctor?</dt>
<dd lang="cmn-Latn_NEW">nî wèi shén mè yão lái kãn yï shëng</dd>
<dd lang="cmn-Latn_OLD">nî wèi shén mè yão lái kãn yï shëng</dd>
<dd lang="yue-Latn_OLD">Wai mud ye si lei tai yee sun?</dd>
<dd lang="nan-Latn_OLD">Ler an zua ai knua lo kun?</dd>
<dt lang="en">How long have you been ill?</dt>
<dt lang="en">When did you first notice anything wrong?</dt>
<dd lang="cmn-Latn_NEW">nî jî shí fä xiãn yôu wèn tí </dd>
<dd lang="cmn-Latn_OLD">nî jî shí fä xiãn yôu wèn tí </dd>
<dd lang="ms">Sejak bila kamu sedar ada sakit?</dd>
<dd lang="yue-Latn_OLD">Kei si fatt yin yau si?</dd>
<dd lang="nan-Latn_OLD">Di si gam dio ga gi bo ho sei?</dd>
